gobblin.runtime.api

Interface SpecStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FSSpecStore

    public interface SpecStore

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSpec(Spec spec)
      Persist Spec in the SpecStore for durability.
      boolean deleteSpec(Spec spec)
      Delete Spec from the SpecStore.

      Delete all versions of the Spec from the SpecStore.
      boolean deleteSpec(URI specUri, String version)
      Delete specifid version of Spec from the SpecStore.
      boolean exists(URI specUri)
      Check if a Spec exists in SpecStore by URI.

      Retrieve all versions of the Spec by URI from the SpecStore.

      Retrieve the latest version of the Spec by URI from the SpecStore.

      Retrieve specified version of the Spec by URI from the SpecStore.

      Get all Specs from the SpecStore.

      Update Spec in the SpecStore.

    • Method Detail

      • exists

        boolean exists(URI specUri)
        throws IOException
        Check if a Spec exists in SpecStore by URI.
        Parameters:
        specUri - URI for the Spec to be checked.
        Throws:
        IOException - Exception in checking if Spec exists.

      • addSpec

        void addSpec(Spec spec)
      throws IOException
        Persist Spec in the SpecStore for durability.
        Parameters:
        spec - Spec to be persisted.
        Throws:
        IOException - Exception in persisting.

      • deleteSpec

        boolean deleteSpec(Spec spec)
            throws IOException
        Delete Spec from the SpecStore. If Spec is not found, it is a no-op.
        Parameters:
        spec - Spec to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if Spec was deleted else false.
        Throws:
        IOException - Exception in deleting.

      • deleteSpec

        boolean deleteSpec(URI specUri)
            throws IOException
        Delete all versions of the Spec from the SpecStore. If Spec is not found, it is a no-op.
        Parameters:
        specUri - URI for the Spec to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if Spec was deleted else false.
        Throws:
        IOException - Exception in deleting.

      • deleteSpec

        boolean deleteSpec(URI specUri,
                   String version)
            throws IOException
        Delete specifid version of Spec from the SpecStore. If Spec is not found, it is a no-op.
        Parameters:
        specUri - URI for the Spec to be deleted.
        version - Version for the Spec to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if Spec was deleted else false.
        Throws:
        IOException - Exception in deleting.

      • updateSpec

        Spec updateSpec(Spec spec)
         throws IOException,
                SpecNotFoundException
        Update Spec in the SpecStore.
        Parameters:
        spec - Spec to be updated.
        Returns:
        Updated Spec.
        Throws:
        IOException - Exception in updating the Spec.
        SpecNotFoundException - If Spec being updated is not present in store.

      • getSpec

        Spec getSpec(URI specUri)
      throws IOException,
             SpecNotFoundException
        Retrieve the latest version of the Spec by URI from the SpecStore.
        Parameters:
        specUri - URI for the Spec to be retrieved.
        Throws:
        IOException - Exception in retrieving the Spec.
        SpecNotFoundException - If Spec being retrieved is not present in store.

      • getSpec

        Spec getSpec(URI specUri,
             String version)
      throws IOException,
             SpecNotFoundException
        Retrieve specified version of the Spec by URI from the SpecStore.
        Parameters:
        specUri - URI for the Spec to be retrieved.
        version - Version for the Spec to be retrieved.
        Throws:
        IOException - Exception in retrieving the Spec.
        SpecNotFoundException - If Spec being retrieved is not present in store.

      • getAllVersionsOfSpec

        Collection<Spec> getAllVersionsOfSpec(URI specUri)
                               throws IOException,
                                      SpecNotFoundException
        Retrieve all versions of the Spec by URI from the SpecStore.
        Parameters:
        specUri - URI for the Spec to be retrieved.
        Throws:
        IOException - Exception in retrieving the Spec.
        SpecNotFoundException - If Spec being retrieved is not present in store.

      • getSpecs

        Collection<Spec> getSpecs()
                   throws IOException
        Get all Specs from the SpecStore.
        Throws:
        IOException - Exception in retrieving Specs.
